name: Frenzy Inc.
description:
Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 32, based on the theme "An Unconventional Weapon"

Everyone on this office is getting on everyone else's nerves and they're finally starting to snap. Eliminate as many of your annoying coworkers as you can, but be careful, your colleagues will fight back if attacked or join in any fight they see.

WASD/mouse to move, E to interact, F to drop current weapon.

Xbox 360 Gamepads are also supported. A to jump, X to interact, Y to drop current weapon.
